DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate effect vitamin D supplementation form Alfacalcidol pulmonary function adult asthmatic Egyptian patient
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Vitamin D Supplementation Pulmonary Functions Adult Asthmatic Egyptian Patients
DOC.detailed_description: Asthmatic patient recruit divide two group . One receive Alfacalcidol beside normal medication act control group receive normal asthma medication . Both group follow four month .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Patients diagnose asthma 2 . Nonsmokers 1 . Liver impairment 2 . Kidney impairment 3 . Patients receive digoxin 4 . Known hypersensitivity 1Î±hydroxyvitamin D3 , vitamin D analogues derivative 5 . Hypercalcaemia 6 . Hyperphosphatemia 7 . Pregnancy breastfeed 8 . Patients nutritional supplement potential effect 25 ( OH ) D serum concentration 9 . Had History stone urinary tract diseases calcium bone metabolism
